name: Relevance
description:
Will you find your purpose once again? 

Waking upon the decimation of everything you ever knew, your purpose as a knight has vanished. The events would  leave you wandering aimlessly through the lands without a motive. That is until you find a glimmer of hope in a mysterious orb, given to you by an old, wise man. He spoke the prophecy of a crystal that could help you regain what you once lost.  Could the rumors be true? Are your abilities good enough to push through?

In this demo you'll get a taste of the main mechanics and the flow of combat, with a quick look at the visuals and the dreamy world the player might encounter.

The demo is downloadable for free on Windows. I don't have friends with Mac so I can't export my project to Mac users, I apologize. As for Linux users, might take some time. I am working alone, please bear with me.

Note: Closing the demo at any point (after opening it to play) will cause all data to reset. I apologize in advance for any inconvenience this might cause.
